title: User Authentication and Registration
summary: Implement secure user registration and multi-factor authentication.
description: Develop a robust user authentication module that ensures secure registration and login using multi-factor authentication. The system should handle password encryption, session management, and account recovery while complying with security and privacy regulations applicable to banking solutions.

title: User Dashboard and Personalization
summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and services.
description: Design and implement a user dashboard that displays banking products, account summaries, and personalized recommendations based on customer profiles and eligibility criteria. The dashboard should provide a clear overview of ongoing requests and notifications, promoting an intuitive and engaging user experience.

title: Responsive User Interface Design
summary: Develop a responsive design for a unified experience across all devices.
description: Build a responsive user interface that provides a consistent, user-friendly experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. The design must adhere to WCAG standards for accessibility and maintain seamless navigation and performance on different screen sizes.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable customers to submit account and service modification requests through guided workflows.
description: Implement dynamic, streamlined workflows that allow customers to initiate and complete account opening or service modification requests with minimal effort. The system should validate user inputs, auto-fill known data, and enable saving incomplete applications for later completion.

title: Document Upload and Management
summary: Allow customers to securely upload and manage necessary documentation.
description: Develop a secure document upload system that allows customers to attach required documents for account requests and updates. The functionality should include secure storage, file validation, and integration with back-office document management systems.

title: Request Tracking and Notification System
summary: Provide real-time status tracking and automated notifications for requests.
description: Create a tracking and notification subsystem that informs users about real-time updates on their requests. Integrate email and in-portal notifications for major request milestones. Enable the display of the complete history of user interactions and actions within the portal.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal with existing core banking systems for real-time data exchange.
description: Establish secure APIs and middleware layers to integrate the self-service portal with the bankâ€™s core systems. Synchronize customer data, transaction history, and service request statuses while ensuring system reliability, data consistency, and minimal latency across all operations.

title: Role-Based Access Control
summary: Implement role-based permissions to control user access to banking services.
description: Design and implement a flexible role-based access control system that defines access permissions according to user profiles, roles, and authorization levels. Ensure the system restricts actions or data visibility based on predefined business rules and compliance standards.

title: Data Security and Compliance Framework
summary: Ensure protection of sensitive user data and compliance with regulatory standards.
description: Develop and enforce a comprehensive security and compliance framework to safeguard sensitive financial data. Include encryption, secure communication channels, audit logging, and compliance with data protection laws such as GDPR and local banking regulations.
